title: ‘Crowd’ Review: A Slow-Motion Rave, With Glints of Violence
description: The choreographer Gisèle Vienne aims to open the doors of perception and bend our experience of time in “Crowd,” at the Brooklyn Academy.
dc:creator: Brian Seibert
media:description: Everybody dance now: The cast of Gisèle Vienne’s “Crowd,” which takes place at a rave, with much of the movement in slow motion.
